util

Class StateValidatorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.StateValidatorUtil

  • public class StateValidatorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will help AStar to compute the adjacent elements of a given vertex. Only singleton object of this class is made available for use to AStar. It will provide functions that helps to validate the state and its values.
    Author:
    dennis

      • getAdjacentPositions

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer[]> getAdjacentPositions(int rowIndex,
                                                       int columnIndex)
        This function is used to find out the valid adjacent positions from the current position
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - current position row
        columnIndex - current position column
        Returns:
        the list of Integers of length 2 [x,y] such that each Integer array is a position that is a valid adjacent position

      • isValidValue

        public static final boolean isValidValue(int value)
        Validates the state values with a given range
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the state (The matrix of values)
        Returns:
        true if it is valid and false if it is not
